verbs.description: [ARG1: son of owner of limo in deadly new york crash] [V: taken] [ARGM-DIR: into custody] the arrest comes amid ongoing scrutiny of the 2001 ford excursion that crashed in schoharie after limo failed to pass inspection twice this year albany state police new york shahed hussain nauman hussain
